note: Site level heterogeneity. Usually random intercept.
Paired design structure. Use as random effect or blocking factor.
Treatment factor of interest (Natural vs Artificial). Always include as fixed effect.
Continuous time trend. Consider as numeric or spline.
Depth related structure. Consider if not too many NAs.
Detection and foraging conditions. Consider as covariate.
Diver and boat presence. Effort related, optional.
Method (Belt vs Stationary). Include as fixed effect if both used.
Transect length. Use as offset or exposure, not as free covariate.
Observer identity. Too many levels, avoid unless clear bias.
